attributes.action: Consider Mandatory Prison sentences for violent acts prepetrated against the Police.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Murdering a police officer in the course of his/her duty should carry a mandatory life sentence of at least 30 years. Wounding, slightly or otherwise a police officer, in the execution of his/her duty should also carry a mandatory prison sentence of anything from 10 years upwards.   It is about time our police officers had the backing and protection they have long deserved. They increasingly put their lives on the line everytime they go on duty with very little respect and thanks from some of the public.
